sentences.en: Although it was off-season, the hotel was fully occupied.
sentences.cn: 虽然处于淡季，这家饭店却客满了。

sentences.en: Elisa has not fully recovered from the incident.
sentences.cn: 埃莉莎还没有完全从这个事件中恢复过来。

sentences.en: He became a fully ordained monk at the age of 20.
sentences.cn: 他在20岁的时候成了正式的修道士。

sentences.en: He came fully awake to hear the bath running.
sentences.cn: 他完全清醒了，听见浴缸里的水在流。

sentences.en: He was fully clothed and covered in puke and piss.
sentences.cn: 他浑身都是污物。

sentences.en: Her boss took her under his wing after fully realizing her potential.
sentences.cn: 老板充分意识到她的潜力后，对她关怀备至。

sentences.en: I am fully aware of your problems.
sentences.cn: 你的问题我全知道。

sentences.en: I fully accept that what he says is true.
sentences.cn: 我完全同意，他的话属实。

sentences.en: I'm fully booked up, I couldn't possibly do it now.
sentences.cn: 我现在忙得很，不可能腾出手做这个。

sentences.en: It was an embryo idea rather than a fully worked proposal.
sentences.cn: 这只是初步的想法，并非成形的提议。

sentences.en: Ministers agreed that this decision was fully justified by economic conditions.
sentences.cn: 部长们一致同意，这个决定完全符合经济情况。

sentences.en: Over one-quarter of the adult population are not fully literate.
sentences.cn: 四分之一以上的成年人不具备完全的读写能力。

sentences.en: The car ferries from the mainland are often fully booked by February.
sentences.cn: 从大陆出发的汽车轮渡常常在2月前就被预订一空。

sentences.en: The changes in policy are fully described in the review.
sentences.cn: 政策的变化在报告中有全面的描述。

sentences.en: The Estonian parliament has passed a resolution declaring the republic fully independent.
sentences.cn: 爱沙尼亚议会已经通过了宣布共和国完全独立的决议。

sentences.en: The question remains whether he was fully aware of the claims.
sentences.cn: 问题是他是否完全意识到了这些要求。

sentences.en: The restaurant is fully booked this evening.
sentences.cn: 今晚这家餐厅订满了。

sentences.en: Their characters are fully formed and they are both very stable children.
sentences.cn: 他们的性格已经完全形成，两人都是非常持重的孩子。

sentences.en: This concept is discussed more fully in Chapter 9.
sentences.cn: 这一概念在第九章中有更详细的论述。

sentences.en: This degree programme is fully accredited by the Institution of Electrical Engineers.
sentences.cn: 这门学位课程经电气工程师学院鉴定完全合格。

sentences.en: We are not yet fully resourced in Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 我们在北爱尔兰目前资源不足。

words.tran_cn: 完全的，完整的；满的，充满的；丰富的；完美的；丰满的；详尽的

trans.tran_cn: 完全地，充分地，彻底地，整整
